tool_description: This API provides endpoints to retrieve distinct vehicle years, makes, models, and trims based on filtering criteria.
name: Carmio
title: Carmio

api_list.name: /trims
api_list.description:
Description: Retrieve distinct vehicle trims based on the given criteria.

Query Parameters:

year: Filter by vehicle year
make: Filter by vehicle make
model: Filter by vehicle model
trim: Filter by vehicle trim
Response:
A JSON array of distinct vehicle trims.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://carmio.p.rapidapi.com/trims"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "carmio.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
